title: Much the Miller's Son volume III Robin's Seven or Nobody's Vault but Mine
description: Robin decides to rob the castle vault, but the Sheriff of Nottingham is on high alert! Much is still in debt to the murderous Will Scarlett, but can Medieval medicine keep his anxiety under control? Laughs, naughty bits and anachronisms abound in Robin's Seven or "Nobody's Vault but Mine"!
author: Steve LeCouilliard
